= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *BA* || *Comments* ||
|| *VCA.V1* || Primary Visual Cortex || Detect color, shape and movements || 17 || Striate Cortex, phyletic memory ||
|| *VCA.V2* || Secondary Visual Cortex || Storage of Object Recognition Memory || 18 || Prestriate Cortex ||
|| *VCA.V3* || Associative Visual Cortex || Processing of global motion, dynamic shapes || 19 || Dorsal Extrastriate Cortex ||
|| *VCA.V4* || Fusiform Gyrus || Recognizing shapes and colors || 37 || Ventral stream ||
|| *VCA.MT* || Middle Temporal Area || Integration of local motion signals into global percepts || 19 || V5, Ventro-dorsal stream ||
|| *VCA.PO* || Parietooccipital Area || Analyzing self-motion relative to the environment || 19 || V6, DM, Dorsomedial Area, Dorsal stream ||
|| *VCA.IT.TEO* || Preoccipital Inferotemporal Area || Represent different features of objects || 21 || ||
|| *VCA.IT.TE* || Inferotemporal Area || Represent different views of objects || 20 || ||
